name: I'm Not Alone! (A Story of Anxiety)
name_original: I'm Not Alone! (A Story of Anxiety)
description:
Play as a lonely boy who has to piece together the emptiness inside him throughout the level. But wait! There's a catch!

The Catch:

You have to solve compounding puzzles fast enough before the meter above your player fills up with red anxiety, while making sure you don't fall in your player's greatest fear; cold, empty, lonely water. This can lead to tight situations where quick thinking and rapid movement can lead  to a pump of adrenaline or a panic attack.

Controls:

A, S, D, Arrow Keys == Movement

W, Space == Jump

R == Restart Level

Made for the Brackeys 2022.2 Game Jam. All assets and music and digital art were created by me, Oimeow.

This game might have a few bugs, as it was uploaded soon before the deadline. Feel free to comment on any bugs that you might find
